content: fair isle fun two simple fair isle hats to knit designed by jackie daugherty sizes youth small adult large adult finished measurements 16 19 21 with plenty of ease 7 8 9 length from hem to top materials madelinetosh tosh dk yarn one skein each in 3 colors 16 circular needles in sizes 4 & 6 double-pointed needles size 6 stitch marker tapestry needle gauge 25 sts x 28 row = 4 over stockinette fair isle stacked stripes directions with size 4 circular needle and mc cast on 96 120 128 sts place marker and join being careful not to twist work in k1tbl p1 ribbing for 8 10 12 rnds change to size 6 circular needle and knit 2 rounds begin stacked stripes chart and work the 6-row chart a total of 2 3 3 times using mc knit 8 2 6 rounds begin crown shaping crown shaping applies to both hats round 1 *k 10 13 14 k2tog repeat from* to end round 2 knit repeat rnds 1 & 2 having one less stitch between decreases ending with k2tog all around 8 stitches remain cut yarn leaving a 10 tail pull through and gather remaining stitches and secure end weave in other ends banded diamond hat directions with size 4 circular needle and mc cast on 96 120 132 sts place marker and join being careful not to twist work in k1tbl p1 ribbing for 8 10 12 rnds change to size 6 circular needle and knit 2 rounds begin and knit all 19 row of banded diamond chart when complete k3 6 9 row with mc note for largest size decrease 4 sts evenly spaced on last round 128 sts begin crown shaping above and finish same as for stacked stripes hat
